game.name: Visual Novel Sisters
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 두 자매의 이야기를 바탕으로 한 비주얼 노벨.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Visual novel based on the tale of two sisters.

reviewHighlights.text: It's a pretty good novel, but with the drawings so-so, in general, I can say that the plot is interesting.
I'm not a fan of the novella genre, but the plot is interesting.
